thread.title: Ben Carson likens abortion to slavery, wants to see Roe v. Wade overturned
thread.title_full: Ben Carson likens abortion to slavery, wants to see Roe v. Wade overturned - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Ben Carson likens abortion to slavery, wants to see Roe v. Wade overturned
text: Ben Carson argued Sunday that abortion should be outlawed in almost all cases, and he likened women who terminate their pregnancies to "slave owners." Asked on NBC’s “Meet the Press” whether a woman should have the right to terminate an unwanted pregnancy, Carson, who is running for the Republican presidential nomination, acknowledged upfront that the […] ...
